mapper.update:
update table_wxs_orders
wxs_trains_num = #{trainsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_seat_num = #{seatNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wxs_total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
wxs_custom_id = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_custom_name = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_ticket_status = #{ticketStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wxs_departure_place = #{departPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_departure_time = #{departTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxs_ticket_barrier = #{ticketBarrier,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where wxs_order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update table_wxs_orders set wxs_trains_num = #{trainsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_seat_num = #{seatNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wxs_total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, wxs_custom_id = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_custom_name = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_ticket_status = #{ticketStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wxs_departure_place = #{departPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_departure_time = #{departTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxs_ticket_barrier = #{ticketBarrier,jdbcType=INTEGER} where wxs_order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from table_wxs_orders where wxs_account = #{0} and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(wxs_date) <= 90 order by wxs_order_num desc limit #{1},7
select count(*) from table_wxs_orders where wxs_account = #{0} and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(wxs_date) <= 90
select * from table_wxs_orders where wxs_date = #{0} order by wxs_order_num desc limit #{1},8
select * from table_wxs_orders where wxs_account = #{0} and wxs_ticket_status = #{2} and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(wxs_date) <= 90 order by wxs_order_num desc limit #{1},7
select count(*) from table_wxs_orders where wxs_date = #{0}
